headline: Mondelēz 2024 Snacking Made Right Report: Climate Change
summary: NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESS Newswire / August 11, 2025 / Mondelez International Our approach to climate change is comprehensive, interconnecting our goals across areas like responsible sourcing, social sustainability, and human rights. FIND OUT MORE ...

headline: How Mondelēz is modernizing Ritz as it turns to snacks to drive growth
summary: The cracker brand’s partnership with Bad Bunny demonstrates how the CPG marketer is looking to connect with consumers around culture.
